contextId.information: The word "denarii" is the plural of "denarius. "AT: "The amount of bread that cost two hundred days' wages."  (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_bmoney]])
contextId.quote: Two hundred denarii worth of bread

contextId.information: A denarius was the amount of silver that a common laborer could earn in one day of work. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_bmoney]])
